content: Ningyi won a PREMIA best student paper award for his Genti paper about graph learning!
Siqiang serves as ICDE 2025 Sponcership Co-chair!
Siqiang and lab members attended PVLDB 2025 (in Guangzhou, China) with three papers about graph algorithms and one paper about data systems.
Zulun attended SIGKDD 2024 (in Barcelona, Spain) to present his paper about dynamic graphs.
Zulun attended IJCAI 2024 (in Jeju) to present a theory paper on graph computing.
Kai attended ACL 2024 (in Bangkok, Thailand) to present his paper on LLM-assisted graph reasoning!
Siqiang starts to serve as an associate editor for journal Data&Knowledge Engineering (DKE)!
Welcome Jiarui to join our lab as a research master to work on data systems!
Junfeng and Dingheng attended SIGMOD 2024 in Santiago, Chile, with two SIGMOD papers about LSM data systems.
Siqiang serves as an Area Chair of NeurIPS 2024!
Siqiang and Zulun attended ICDE 2024 in Utrecht, Netherlands, to present a paper about PPR algorithms over graphs.
